h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time
content: From here, go through the door to the right of the shrine and straight up the stairs. Go through the door at the top, and into the courtyard with the giant tree in the middle.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time'.
The content is as follows:
From here, go through the door to the right of the shrine and straight up the stairs. Go through the door at the top, and into the courtyard with the giant tree in the middle.
